titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King and Queen in Their Majesties Chappel at St. James's on Sunday, October 24, 1686 by the Reverend Father Dom. W.M. Monk of the Holy Order of St. Benedict ...
titleStmt.author: Wall, William Cuthbert, 1625?-1704.

notesStmt.note: W.M. (i.e. William Marsh) is an alias of William Cuthbert Wall. Cf. Snow, A. Obit book of the English Benedictines, 1913, p. 68.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
